name: Miniature Rose ring
description:
This sweet miniature rose of crimson red sits atop an aqua blue textured band. 

The rose measures 35mm in radius.

The band is 55mm, however as it's crocheted with oh so soft mercerized cotton yarn, there's a bit of give for slightly larger fingers.

The rose is also created with mercerized pure cotton yarn - quality material for quality beauty.

Other colours and sizes can be created... simply email me your request or if you have any questions. Price for custom made will be the same.

Price is in Australian Dollars.
